name: Meet The Mayor
description:
MEET THE MAYOR

The villagers of Wibbit Town want to hold a festival and need your help to prepare!

Made in 48 hours for the Wholesome Game Jam 2022 with the theme Community!

CONTROLS
Enter to progress text
WASD or Middle Mouse to pan the camera, Mouse Wheel to zoom in and out
Left click to select a villager and right click to tell them where to go

Made by Legends Media, Mistafixxa and Nommles 🤍
